flawed_nl_solution:
We know she counted 24 red jelly beans and 18 white jelly beans so 24 + 18 = <<24+18=42>>42 jelly beans
Even though she only bought 1 bag of jellybeans, she thought it would take 3 bags to fill up the bowl. So 3 bags * 42 jellybeans = <<1*42+1*42+1*42=162>>162 total red & white jellybeans
#### 162

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 126, not 162. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
